full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/18/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE 150 Tremont St., Boston, Mass. 02111 Date May 10, 1966 File A-10 294 862(IB)ACM Mass. Commissioner of Probation Room 206, New Court House Pemberton Square Boston, Massachusetts Dear Sir: A check of your records is requested in the case of: Name Sex Race MAR Doo; aka MAR Au-Sang; MAR Gong-Doo M Y Present address 32 Oxford St., Boston, Mass. Prior addresses 2 Warrenton St. (3rd floor), Boston, Mass. Birthplace Birthdate Occupation Kwangtung, China 7/15/08 dishwasher Identifying marks Eyes Hair Height Weight Complexion Fingerprint Classification brown black 5'4" 125 sallow Remarks: Father: MA Gwoon Gwoon Mother: WONG Shee Wife : WONG Lai Yung Please advise what your records reflect concerning any investigation, arrest or conviction of the subject, or any other information relevant to his moral character or loyalty. A self-addressed en- velope is enclosed for your use. Requesting Officer Title PATRICK F. COOMEY, Asst. District Director for Investigations FOR USE BY AGENCY PERFORMING RECORD SEARCH No Record Record as follows (use reverse side If more space is required) Signature Title Date Form G-305 (7-21-58)
